short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FeedLearn helps you learn vocabulary by showing you quizzes as you browse your Facebook feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FeedLearn helps you learn Japanese vocabulary as you browse your Facebook feed by showing you quizzes as you browse your Facebook feed. Please login at https://feedlearn.herokuapp.com/study1 and do the pre-test for week 1 vocabulary after installing.
